# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.4 on Wed Nov 25 11:43:38 2020
*filter
:INPUT DROP [0:0]
:FORWARD DROP [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [1:251]
-A INPUT -s 192.168.1.1/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j DROP
-A INPUT -s 192.168.1.1/32 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j DROP
-A INPUT -s 192.168.1.0/24 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.1.0/24 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.1/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.1/32 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.3.0/24 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.3.0/24 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.1/32 -p icmp -m icmp --icmp-type 8 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.3.0/24 -p icmp -m icmp --icmp-type 8 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.1/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.3.1/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -m conntrack --ctstate NEW,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -j LOG --log-prefix "** NOT ALLOWED **" --log-level 6
-A INPUT -j DROP
COMMIT
# Completed on Wed Nov 25 11:43:38 2020
